column4: audacity seems like incompatibile with pulse, so why is it in repos

Spec audacity doesn't work in 9.10 so why is it in repos
Because you can get it to work most likely and it's an awesome application?
furthermore, there are pulse audio wrappers....
Spec it is awesome, and it doesn't work in 9.10 with pulse audio
did you uninstall pulse or something? What do you've got in audacity>edit>preferences>devices
in pavucontrol audacity does not appear as a recording application
Spec Alan502 pjfry1 in pavucontrol audacity does not appear as a recording application
is audacity trying to access sound via OSS?
hmm, well, padsp is a pulse audio wrapper for oss, I thought alsa worked transparently with pulse?
